Text: Once there are enough seeders on this I will be uploading Doctor Zhivago and then Dune (Directors Cut).  My uploads are dvd rips from my personal collections unless otherwise specified.

Thanks for this great upload. I request that you add photo shots or a sample to know the status of the picture quality. I have previouly downloaded a dvdrip, but didnt watch due to bad quality. I hope your's is better.
I will try to start upping screenshots or something with my rips.  Let me just say that I do not up crap quality.  If I won't watch it myself, I won't share it.  That is why my file sizes are so big.
